author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Attraqt Group Says ‍FY Revenue Increased By 278 Pct
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Attraqt Group Plc:
* ‍FY REVENUE INCREASED BY 278% TO £13.6M​ * FY ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA (PRE-EXCEPTIONAL) LOSSES WERE £0.2M (2016: £1.6M)​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
